p: Active compound, active column fraction (having best antifungal activity against A. solani) was subjected to GC-MS analysis. Only one active compounds observed on GC-MS chromatogram. According the peaks matching of GC-MS chromatogram with available data base showed the presence of benzoic acid in active fraction of Thevetia peruviana leaf extract which is already known chemical among the phytochemicals described for antimicrobial activity.
